description: Traveller weapon reference data (Mongoose 2e / High Guard)

turretWeapons.name: Pulse Laser
turretWeapons.notes: High accuracy, rapid fire. Best for precision targeting.

turretWeapons.name: Beam Laser
turretWeapons.notes: Reliable workhorse weapon. Good range, low power draw.

turretWeapons.name: Sandcaster
turretWeapons.notes: Fires canister of ablative particles. Reduces incoming damage.

turretWeapons.name: Missile Rack
turretWeapons.notes: Guided missiles. High damage but limited ammunition.

barbetteWeapons.name: Particle Barbette
barbetteWeapons.notes: Devastating damage plus radiation effects on crew.

barbetteWeapons.name: Ion Barbette
barbetteWeapons.notes: Disrupts electronics. Causes system/crew hits without hull damage.

barbetteWeapons.name: Plasma Barbette
barbetteWeapons.notes: Superheated plasma. Extremely effective at close range.

pointDefense.when: Always have sand ready before combat

tactics.opening: Let fighters engage with missiles at long range
tactics.disable: Switch to Ion for system hits when boarding planned
tactics.defense: Keep one turret on sand duty at all times
tactics.calledShots: Use pulse lasers for precise targeting
